item.description:
Put on your most glamorous shoes, join us for a fabulous ladies night and come mingle with other shoe loving fashionistas while enjoying complimentary wine, cheese, and delicious appetizers.

Amidst the footwear, fashion, and fun, you can check out California Closets' gorgeous showroom, enjoy the latest in spring and summer fashions, compete for fabulous prizes in the pink carpet walk-off, and enter to win a $2,500 California Closets gift certificate.

California Closets is the leader in creating beautiful, functional home closets, and the Brighton facility showcases many different design options for you to peruse and enjoy.

Raffle proceeds will benefit Project Smile, a nonprofit organization dedicated to helping children involved in traumatic events.

 

California Closets is located at 1660 Soldiers Field Road, Brighton. There's plenty of free parking.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside California Closets . If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.why: Join the Hello Stiletto Shoe Club and other fabulous ladies for a spring cocktail party- enjoy complimentary wine, cheese, and delicious appetizers.
item.name: Ladies Night at California Closets, Brighton. Wine Tasting, Free Apps and More!
